xwikidoc.content: ### Home page ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.homePageTitle=App Within Minutes ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.description=Create collaborative web applications within minutes, based on XWiki's powerful structured data management system. ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.createAppButtonLabel=Create Application ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appsLiveTableHeading=Applications ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appsLiveTable.doc.title=Application ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appsLiveTable.doc.author=Last author ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appsLiveTable.doc.date=Update date ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appsLiveTable._actions=Actions ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.grantSpaceAdminRightsSaveComment=Grant space administration rights. ### AWM Applications panel entry ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appPanelCreateEntry=Create your own! ### Wizard step ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepHeading=Step {0} \u2014 {1} ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.name.name=Name ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.name.title=Name your application ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.name.description=Choose the application name ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.structure.name=Structure ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.structure.title=Structure your data ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.structure.description=Describe the application data ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.entries.name=Entries ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.entries.title=Locate your data ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.entries.description=Choose where to store the data ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.presentation.name=Presentation ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.presentation.title=Customize your application home page ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.presentation.description=Customize the application home page ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepNextButtonLabel=Next Step ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepNextButtonTip=Go to next step ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepFinishButtonLabel=Finish ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepFinishButtonTip=Go to the application home page ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepPreviousButtonLabel=Previous Step ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepPreviousButtonTip=Go to previous step ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepHelpTitle=Steps ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepHelpDescription=This wizard will guide you through the process of creating an application. These are the steps you'll take: ### Wizard Step 1: Application Name ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.createApp.location.label=Location ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.createApp.location.hint=The location in the page hierarchy where the application will be created. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.createApp.parent.label=Parent ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.createApp.parent.hint=The parent of the new application. Leave this field empty if you want to create a top level application. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.createApp.parent.placeholder=Path.To.Parent ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.codeSpace.title=Code ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.codeSpace.description=This is the place where the application code is located. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.codeSpace.hiddenPagesInfo=The hidden pages are also listed, even though your current user profile settings prevent to do so, otherwise none of the application code pages would be visible because they are all hidden by default. ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appNamePageTitle=Create Application ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appNameLabel=Application Name ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appNameHint=The application name determines the homepage URL and the location where the application code is stored. ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appNamePreviewHomePageUrlLabel=Application homepage URL ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appNamePreviewCodeSpaceLabel=Application code location ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appNameIsUsedWarning=This application already exists. If you go to the next step you will be editing the existing application. ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appNameEmptyError=Please enter the application name. ### Wizard Step 2: Application structure. avatar. Works only for a table bound to the XWiki.XWikiUsers class ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorTitleHint=The application title to be displayed on the application home page, on the applications panel and live table, on the breadcrumb, etc. ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDescriptionHint=The content to be displayed on the homepage above the live table with the application data. Use it to describe the application. ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorColumnsHint=Select the columns you would like to include in the live table displayed on the application home page. ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorSaveComment=Update LiveTable ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorMoveColumnHint=Drag and drop to change the order ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDeleteColumnHint=Delete ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorAddColumnHint=Add selected column ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDeprecatedColumnsWarning=Some columns are deprecated, probably because the corresponding application fields have been deleted. Do you want to remove them? Yes / No ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorIcon=Icon ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorIconHintWithPicker=The application icon. You can select an icon from the icon picker or you can reference an attached image. ### Application home page ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appLiveTableHeading=Entries ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appLiveTableEditEntryActionName=Edit ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appLiveTableDeleteEntryActionName=Delete ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appHomePageActionsHeading=Actions ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appHomePageAddEntryLabel=Add ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appHomePageAddEntryHint=Add new entry ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appHomePageEntryNameLabel=Entry name: ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appHomePageDeleteEntriesLabel=Delete all entries ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appHomePageEditAppLabel=Edit application ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appHomePageTranslateAppLabel=Translate application ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appHomePageDeleteAppLabel=Delete application ### Delete application dialog ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.deleteAppConfirmation=The application {0} and ALL its entries will be deleted.
